title: Flaming Live Watch Face
summary: A flaming face for your watch!
description: Enjoy procedural realistic flames on your watch, lighting up whenever you look at it.Includes the standard fire look for free, with additional colors unlockable.Works well with ambient mode, including low-bit devices, and was developed with battery life in mind.**Latest update:**Now you can unlock an infinite number of looks for your watch!Customize your flames using any colors you want.Also improved readability in ambient mode and made the font less blurry.
descriptionHTML:
Enjoy procedural realistic flames on your watch, lighting up whenever you look at it.

Includes the standard fire look for free, with additional colors unlockable.

Works well with ambient mode, including low-bit devices, and was developed with battery life in mind.


**Latest update:**

Now you can unlock an infinite number of looks for your watch!

Customize your flames using any colors you want.

Also improved readability in ambient mode and made the font less blurry.
comments: Good look and feel Absolutely love the color customization. Fantastic face.
Looking good Looking really nice, good job!
Looks cool, if a little blurry Slight lag in the flames when scrolling notifications, otherwise cool!
Colors could be more vibrant. Sometimes it's hard to tell foreground and background apart on the watch face even though the color pickers show clearly distinctly colors.
Downloads but won't  show But icon will not come up on S5 screen & d/load notice won't say "open now" - am stuck.  Help
